ConnectorArn.description: The arn of the connector. The arn is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.

Lambda.description: Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

ConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.

LambdaArn.description: Lambda ARN of the connector being registered.

LambdaConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

description: Creates a new connector profile associated with your AWS account . There is a soft quota of 100 connector profiles per AWS account . If you need more connector profiles than this quota allows, you can submit a request to the Amazon AppFlow team through the Amazon AppFlow support channel. In each connector profile that you create, you can provide the credentials and properties for only one connector.

ConnectorLabel.description: The label used for registering the connector.

ConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: The configuration required for registering the connector.

ConnectorProvisioningType.description: The provisioning type used to register the connector.

Description.description: A description about the connector runtime setting.
